dict.string: Our app needs continuous Bluetooth access to connect with nearby Bluetooth Knaap devices. This enables seamless device synchronization and ensures that all features are available whenever you need them, enhancing your app experience while maintaining your privacy and security.

Our app needs to connect with Bluetooth devices to offer enhanced features like wireless syncing and external device control. Your consent to enable Bluetooth connectivity helps improve your app experience.
Camera permission is required for barcode scanning and taking pictures.
We need access to your contacts to show the friends of you within the app.
Our app requires ongoing access to your location to provide real-time navigation with your friends. We ensure your location data is handled securely and with respect for your privacy.

Our app needs to access your location to provide location-based features such as nearby search results. We prioritize your privacy and only use your location data for improving your in-app experience.

Our app needs access to your photo library to let you choose photos for uploading and personalizing your profile. We respect your privacy and do not access your photos without your explicit permission.
